summary.span: 报告作为整体 XAML 系统（在 .NET Framework XAML 服务中实现）的一部分的 XAML 类型相关信息。

span.span: Reports information about XAML types as part of the overall XAML system that is implemented in .NET Framework XAML Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的许多 Api类提供有关 XAML 类型，它们报告的概念是类似于特定的 XAML 规范 [MS-XAML] 节的信息。Many APIs in the class provide information about XAML types, where the concept they report on is similar to particular sections of the XAML specification [MS-XAML]. 是广泛使用.NET Framework XAML 服务 API 中有关 XAML 类型的报表信息。 is used extensively in the .NET Framework XAML Services API for reporting information about a XAML type. 报告可能需要了解的有关 XAML 类型才能使用实例或从 XAML 节点流中或类似的 XAML 表示形式访问其成员的信息。 reports the information that you might need to know about a XAML type in order to work with an instance or to access its members from a XAML node stream, or a similar XAML representation. 其 reporting 是类似于如何CLR 类型系统中，以及反射类如，提供有关 CLR 类型和其用法的信息。Its reporting is similar to how the in the CLR type system, together with reflection classes such as , provide information about a CLR type and its usage. 若要扩展的 XAML 类型系统，你可以从派生。To extend the XAML type system, you can derive from . 若要有效执行此操作，你可能还需要实现。To do so effectively, you might also need to implement a . 启用通用的 XAML 类型系统，若要使用的类型系统支持你指定的调用行为的一部分。The enables the generalized XAML type system to work with the type system backing that you specify as part of the invocation behavior. 特定的自定义提供一种方法，以减少在 CLR 类型系统中，所使用的默认值的依赖关系行为。The specific custom provides a way to reduce the dependencies on the CLR type system, which are used by the default behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管可分配的类型不具有的引用类型的所有功能，你可以对分配来使用它。Although the assignable type does not have all the capabilities of the reference type, you can use it for assignment. 例如，可以使用分配以使属性的值的类型匹配。For example, you can use assignment to make type matches for the values of a property. 在 XAML 中的分配类型的概念是 CLR 类型系统中的向上转换的概念类似。The concept of assignable types in XAML is similar to the concept of casting up in the CLR type system. 例如下的 CLR 类型系统，每个类型具有其可分配的类型列表中。For example, under a CLR type system, every type has an in its assignable type list. 如果两种状态之一使用实例比较具有等于`true`，此方法已返回特殊未知的模式`true`如果两个实例是否相等。If one of the two instances that are used for comparison has equal to `true`, this method has a special Unknown mode that returns `true` if the two instances are equivalent. 默认实现使用 CLR从此和输入，并调用。The default implementation uses the CLR from for this and the input , and calls . 如果你想分配类型的一种方式确定，重写此方法。Override this method if you want a different determination of assignable types. 传递 null`xamlType`不会引发异常，并始终返回`false`。Passing a null `xamlType` does not throw an exception and always returns `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 是虚拟的并且因此，可以重写。 is virtual, and therefore, can be overridden. 重写有可能 (恶意或其他) 若要更改的 XAML 类型可分配性，以便它不再按预期的方式其基础的 CLR 类型的类型转换行为一致。The override has the potential (whether for malicious purposes or otherwise) to change the assignability of a XAML type so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type-casting behavior of its underlying CLR type. 为了进行的赋值操作或访问任何安全关键检查，请改为使用的基础 CLR 类型。For any security-critical checks of assignment operations and access, use the underlying CLR type instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 名称范围强制实施的或多个属性用于名称的唯一性`x:Name` / `[name property]`。A XAML namescope enforces the name uniqueness of the property or properties used for `x:Name` / `[name property]`. 如果是`true`，强制唯一性的某种机制都应存在，并且应从拥有 XAML 名称范围的此类型角度进行评估。If is `true`, some mechanism for enforcing uniqueness should exist and should evaluate from the perspective of this type owning a XAML namescope. 在遇到另一个 XAML 名称范围所属类型之前，XAML 名称范围随后扩展到类型的内容。The XAML namescope then extends to the content of the type until another XAML namescope-owning type is encountered. 此属性对齐到`[is name scope]`[MS-XAML] 规范中的信息项。This property aligns to the `[is name scope]` information item in the [MS-XAML] specification. 如果不使用的默认内部 CLR 反射技术，此属性的调用会上重写派生类。If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a , calls to this property can invoke overrides on derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自上而下的是在创建对象图时对与 XAML 处理器行为相近的比喻。Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when creating the object graph. 自上而下生成，当一个类型实例化时，附加到父级，并且然后设置其属性。When built top-down, a type is instantiated, attached to the parent, and then has its properties set. 自上而下构造可避免调用多次的属性更改处理程序。Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times. 这种处理波及对象图因此，消除了多个处理程序调用并提供为启动一个性能优化选项的对象图。Such handling ripples up the object graph and therefore, eliminates the multiple handler calls and provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph. 如果不使用的默认内部 CLR 反射技术，此属性的调用会上重写派生类。If you do not use the default internal CLR reflection technique for a , calls to this property can invoke overrides on derived classes. 有关返回值和其他行为的详细信息，请参阅的文档在此类型上。For more information about return values and other behavior, see the documentation for on this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自上而下的是在创建对象图时对与 XAML 处理器行为相近的比喻。Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when it creates the object graph. 生成时的上下的类型实例化，附加到父级，并设置其属性。When built top-down, a type is instantiated, attached to the parent, and has its properties set. 自上而下构造可避免调用多次的属性更改处理程序。Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times. 这种处理波及对象图因此，消除了多个处理程序调用并提供为启动一个性能优化选项的对象图。Such handling ripples up the object graph and therefore, eliminates the multiple handler calls and provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph. 可以调用此方法通过调用。This method can be invoked by calls to . 默认实现返回一个值基于读取。The default implementation returns a value based on reading . 它还可以检查如果无特性包含在紧挨的基础类型的属性。It can also check for the attribute if no attribute is found on the immediate underlying type. 如果没有可用的值，它将返回`false`。If a value is unavailable, it returns `false`. 重写此方法，如果你想若要使用不同的逻辑。Override this method if you want to use different logic.
